test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/cobol
2. Enter the value 'admin' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'admin1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'Variable Impact Report'.
6. Enter the value 'AP540-CARRY-OVR-REC' in the field.
7. Click on 'Search'.
8. Enter the value 'SORT-RECORD' in the field.
9. Click on 'Search'.
10. Click on 'Log Out'.
